entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:59 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.2°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 66 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 37 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 37 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
